name: ODWEN
headline: AirBnB for Small Warehouses
description: ODWEN enables India’s 60m SME's to find curated warehouses in minutes at prices 20% below current market and transport their inventory in and out with just a few clicks.  With 2000+ warehouses across 180 locations, we are the largest integrated 3PL/ warehouse network in India.

founders.name: VIJAY ANAND BHAGAVATULA, Founder
founders.description: 20+ yrs in I-Banking, Strategy/ M&A and P&L roles. Incubated new ventures with ~$300Mn investments. Sloan Fellow from London Business School.

# WAREHOUSING
##### Made Simple, Secure & Affordable
SEARCH NOW
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/factory.png)
#### WHY ODWEN?
#####  Welcome to India’s first do-it-yourself warehouse management system. Here, all you need to do is search for a warehouse, choose one you like and book. That’s it! 
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/whyOdwen/icon-1.png)
###### 100% Flexibility
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/whyOdwen/icon-2.png)
###### 24 x 7 Surveillance
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/whyOdwen/icon-3.png)
###### Complete Control
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/whyOdwen/icon-4.png)
###### Cost Effective
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/whyOdwen/icon-5.png)
###### Quality Control Assurance
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/whyOdwen/Icon-61.png)
###### Assured Hygiene
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/whyOdwen/icon-7.png)
###### More Options
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/whyOdwen/icon-8.png)
###### Value Added Services
#### HOW IT WORKS
##### ODWEN IS SIMPLEHere's how you can start storing with Odwen.
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/howItWorks/search-blue.png) ![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/howItWorks/search.png)
##### search
###### Our search engine allows you to search warehouses on multiple criteria like size, location, budget, duration.
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/howItWorks/website-blue.png) ![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/howItWorks/book-white.png)
##### book
###### Found something you like? Simply book it and you are ready to store. Generate a barcode. Print and paste it on the consignment you want to store.
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/howItWorks/warehouse-blue.png) ![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/howItWorks/warehouse-white.png)
##### store
###### You can send your consignment to the warehouse on your own, or employ our inhouse logistic services. The warehouse personnel scans the barcode on consignment and approves storage.
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/howItWorks/retrive-blue.png) ![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/howItWorks/retrive-white.png)
##### retrieve
###### Odwen’s Technology Platform allows you to track, store, retrieve your consignment online, 24 x 7 from anywhere.
###### So What's Next?
### are you ready? let's work!
[CONTACT US](https://www.odwen.co.in/<https:/odwen.co.in/contact_us>)
![](https://odwen.co.in/img/version2/logoWhite.png)
Welcome to India’s first do-it-yourself warehouse management system. Here, all you need to do is search for a warehouse, choose one you like, select services and book. That’s it!

generated_description:
### ODWEN: Revolutionizing Warehouse Management in India

Imagine an Airbnb for small warehouses—that’s ODWEN in a nutshell. Launched in 2021 and based out of Delhi, India, ODWEN is on a mission to transform how small and medium enterprises (SMEs) in India manage their inventory. With around 60 million SMEs in the country, there’s a significant market opportunity here, and ODWEN aims to make warehouse access simple, efficient, and cost-effective.

They’ve built the **largest integrated 3PL (third-party logistics) and warehouse network in India**, boasting over **2,000 warehouses across 180 locations**. What’s impressive is that they offer these spaces at **20% below current market prices**, allowing businesses to optimize their storage costs seamlessly. Their platform allows users to **search, book, and manage** warehouses in just a few clicks—making the process almost effortless. 

The website, [odwen.co.in](https://www.odwen.co.in), serves as a user-friendly portal that offers a DIY (do-it-yourself) warehouse management system. Users can:

1. **Search** for warehouses based on size, location, budget, and duration.
2. **Book** their preferred space and generate a barcode for easy tracking.
3. **Store** their inventory, choosing either to handle logistics themselves or utilize ODWEN’s in-house services.
4. **Retrieve** their goods, all while keeping tabs through a comprehensive online platform available 24/7.

### The Team and Support

With a dynamic team of **21 employees** and the backing of **Y Combinator (Batch S21)**, ODWEN is well-positioned to disrupt an industry that traditionally suffers from inefficiency and opacity. Their services prioritize **flexibility**, **security**, and **cost-effectiveness**, catering specifically to the needs of smaller businesses that often struggle to find suitable warehousing solutions.

### Why Choose ODWEN?

So, why go with ODWEN? Here are a few compelling reasons:
- **Flexibility** in choosing the right space that meets specific needs.
- **24/7 surveillance** for peace of mind.
- **Complete control** over inventory management.
- **Cost-effective** solutions that do not compromise on quality or service.
- Value-added services that enhance the overall warehousing experience.

In a nutshell, ODWEN is democratizing warehouse access for Indian SMEs, allowing them to thrive in a competitive landscape without the burden of exorbitant storage costs or complex logistics. If you’re in the market for innovative warehousing solutions, ODWEN is definitely worth a closer look. Ready to redefine your storage experience? They’re just a click away!
